revised_title: Inhibition of Bud Development and the Role of Growth Substance in Vicia Faba
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on Vicia faba plants to understand the role of growth substance (auxin) in inhibiting bud development. They discovered that the terminal bud and leaves produce growth substance, which inhibits the development of lateral buds. The study proves that growth substance is the inhibitor of lateral bud development in plants.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
